summary: Earning app on Internet Computer with Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity authentication, and game functionality

existing_features.title: Set up Internet Identity authentication system allowing users to sign in and sign out
Build frontend dashboard displaying user's current earnings balance and profile information
Implement a task completion system where users can view available tasks and mark them as complete to earn rewards
Create a transaction history feature showing all earning activities including task completions and amounts earned
Design a modern, engaging visual theme with vibrant colors and clear typography that appeals to users seeking earning opportunities, avoiding blue and purple color schemes
Create a simple interactive game component in the frontend that users can play to earn rewards
Add a Game page route in the frontend navigation and integrate it with the existing Layout component
Create React Query hooks for game-related operations including game state fetching and game completion mutations

new_feature_requests.summary: Set up Internet Computer project with Motoko backend and React frontend
Create user profile system in backend to store user data including principal ID, earnings balance, and join date
Add game functionality to the earning app
Add backend endpoint to record game completions and award rewards to users when they successfully complete a game session
Add first-time login bonus of 10 rupees to new user accounts
Modify the backend user registration logic to automatically credit 10 rupees to a user's account balance when they register for the first time during login
Create a transaction record in the transaction history showing the 10 rupee signup bonus when a new user registers
